Santa_Cruz.De Laveaga Disc Golf Course: De Laveaga Disc Golf Course ("Dela") is a world-renowned 27-hole disc golf course in the hills of De Laveaga Park above Santa Cruz, California. It boasts one of the original long disc golf courses, with some holes measuring more than 500 feet in length. The 27th hole, "Top of the World," is one of the most famous holes in disc golf; the tee box is situated nearly 600 feet from the pin—and 100 feet above it.
